about.title: About Me

projects.title: Undowntime
projects.description: A cold-start prevention and uptime monitoring service for serverless and hobby apps. Features include custom domain verification, ping scheduler, alerting, and Razorpay integration.

projects.title: React Starter Plus

projects.title: WTC (What's The Context?)
